Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.soloMode

Class LorenzoIlMagnifico

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observable<GameEvent>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.soloMode.LorenzoIlMagnifico
public class LorenzoIlMagnifico
extends Observable<GameEvent>
This class represents Lorenzo il Magnifico, who the player has to face in SoloMode. Every time the player passes the turn, Lorenzo performs his action by drawing a Token and performing the associated effect. Lorenzo can move on the faith track like any other player and can activate Vatican Reports.

  • Method Details

    • moveBlackCross

      public boolean moveBlackCross​(int pos)
      Moves Lorenzo's cross forward on player's Faith Track.
      Parameters:
      pos - indicates number of cells that has been covered.
      Returns:
      whether Lorenzo has activated a Vatican Report.

    • throwDevCards

      public void throwDevCards​(ColorCard color)
      Perform Lorenzo's action of discarding two development cards from decks. Player loses the possibility to buy them, If cards of a certain color finish, notifies Game instance that the event occurred.
      Parameters:
      color - represents color of the cards to be discarded.
